text: Birger Breivik (26 October 1912 - 28 June 1996) was a Norwegian politician for the Christian Democratic Party. He was born in Fyresdal. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Aust-Agder in 1958, but was not re-elected in 1961. ==References== * Category:1912 births Category:1996 deaths Category:People from Fyresdal Category:Christian Democratic Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Birger Breivik
